New Records: Cole Ragans tied a club record with eight consecutive strikeouts between the first and third innings
Cole Ragans has the most strikeouts in a single season for a Royals left-hander with 197 strikeouts in 161 1/3 innings
Key Match Events: Cole Ragans allowed five runs in the sixth inning, spoiling his historic strikeout night

Post-Match Reflections: Cole Ragans expressed frustration about allowing five runs in the sixth inning
